Package net.silthus.schat.events.message

Class SendChannelMessageEvent

java.lang.Object
net.silthus.schat.events.message.SendChannelMessageEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cancellable, SChatEvent
public final class SendChannelMessageEvent extends Object implements SChatEvent, Cancellable
The SendChannelMessageEvent is fired before a Channel forwards a message to its Channel.targets().

The SendMessageEvent will be called before this event and the message will already be sealed.

You can however Message.copy() the message and set a new one that will be forwarded or set new targets(Targets) that the message will be forwarded to.

The targets in this event are a copy of the channel target list and not backed by the channel. Any modification of those targets are not reflected in the actual targets of the channel. They are only scoped to the forwarded message of this event.

Since:
1.0.0
